User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the DataConnect Nigeria application.

referralCode.description: Referral code used by the user (optional).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a single transaction made by a user.

network.description: The mobile network or service provider.

details.description: A description of the transaction (e.g., data plan, TV package).

recipientPhone.description: The phone number or Smart Card/IUC number that received the service.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created.

definition.description: Stores user information. 'userId' is equal to `request.auth.uid`. This ensures path-based ownership. It is created upon user registration.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user. It is equal to the Firebase Authentication UID.

definition.description: Stores a user's transaction history. Each document is a single purchase or conversion.

params.name: userId
params.description: The UID of the user who owns these transactions.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure now includes a 'transactions' subcollection for each user to store their purchase history. This allows for easy retrieval of a user's transactions while maintaining the strict ownership security model. The User entity is updated with a `createdAt` field.
